clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Non-pharmacological and Pharmacological Treatment for oVerweight and Obesity in pAtients of the Outpatient Register (EVA)
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Non-pharmacological and Pharmacological Treatment for Overweight and Obesity in Patients With Cardiovascular Diseases or With High Cardiovascular Risk According to the Results of Patients' Interviews Within the Outpatient Registry

lead_sponsor.agency: National Research Center for Preventive Medicine

clinical_study.source: National Research Center for Preventive Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: A prospective non-interventional single-centre study aimed to assess the current practice of non-pharmacological treatment and pharmacological therapy of overweight and obesity in patients with cardiovascular diseases (CVD) or with a high risk of CVD according to the patients' survey data

detailed_description.textblock:
To interview 300 patients with a body mass index (BMI) ≥25 kg / m² of the outpatient register, who come for a primary or secondary visit to the Center. The specifically designed questionnaire contains topics about patients' self-concept of their body mass; doctors' prescriptions of therapy for obesity, patients' adherence to recommendations.
A repeated short telephone interview of these patients will be conducted in 1-1.5 years after visit inclusion to clarify the dynamics of weight and methods of its correction.

primary_outcome.measure: The proportion of patients received non-pharmacological treatment recommendations
primary_outcome.description: Non-pharmacological methods of treatment: diet treatment, increasing physical activity

primary_outcome.measure: The proportion of patients received pharmacological treatment recommendations
Patients' self-concept of their body mass
primary_outcome.description: The proportion of patients who assess their weight as normal weight, overweight or obesity. Patient knowledge of obesity and overweight treatment methods

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of overweight and obesity treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Dynamics of the patient's body weight in a prospective observation

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient self-assessment of previous overweight and obesity treatments effectiveness
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of patients who rated the effectiveness of treatment as effective short-term, effective long-term, ineffective

study_pop.textblock: patients with overweight or obesity and with CVD or with a high risk of CVD

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
patients of the outpatient "PROFILE" registry with CVD or with a high risk of CVD (≥5%), with overweight (BMI≥25 kg/m2) or obesity (BMI≥30 kg/m2). Presence of written informed consent to participate in the study, fill in the original questionnaire and given consent to the processing of personal data
Exclusion Criteria:
normal weight, pregnancy
